704 class ResourceItem : public QTreeWidgetItem, public rev::Object {
705 public:
706  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
709 
710  enum ResourceItemType {
711  kResourceHandle = 2000, // Tree widget item takes a type
712  kCategory
713  };
714 
716 
717  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
720  ResourceItem(const QString& text);
721  ResourceItem(const std::shared_ptr<ResourceHandle>& handle);
722  ~ResourceItem();
723 
725  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
728 
729  std::shared_ptr<ResourceHandle> handle() { return m_handle; }
730 
732  void performAction(UndoCommand* command);
733 
736  void setWidget();
737  void removeWidget();
738 
740  inline const std::shared_ptr<ResourceHandle>& handle() const { return m_handle; }
741 
743  ResourceItemType itemType() const { return ResourceItemType(type()); }
744 
746  View::ResourceTreeWidget* resourceTreeWidget() const;
747 
748 
750 
751  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
754  virtual const char* className() const override { return "ResourceItem"; }
755  virtual const char* namespaceName() const override { return "rev::View:ResourceItem"; }
756 
758 
759 protected:
760  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
763 
764  friend class ComponentTreeWidget;
765 
767 
768 
769  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
772 
774  static ResourceItemType getItemType(std::shared_ptr<Object> object);
775 
777  void initializeItem();
778 
779 
781 
782  //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
785 
787  std::shared_ptr<ResourceHandle> m_handle;
788 
790  QWidget* m_widget;
791 
793 };
